" Eric Schmidt was also criticized for allowing Google be overtaken by Facebook, for the company's increasingly frequent privacy scandals and its increasing internal bureaucracy. Together with the co- founders, he decided to step aside.In announcing the move Thursday, Eric Schmidt said that the company no longer needed his "adult supervision and that Page, 38, was ready to run the world's leading internet company. confirmed details of Simon Cowell 's X Factor M onday morning. The big prize will be a$ 5 million Sony Music record deal. Contestants as young as 12 can compete. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, said Simon Cowell in a statement. "I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract.
